actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection and Competitiveness.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection, and Competitiveness

official_title: Relating to State actions to protect children from injury in motor vehicle accidents.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of the House of Representatives that each State should require by law that: (1) any child under 17 years old, while in a motor vehicle that is in operation, must be properly restrained; and (2) the failure of an operator to comply with that requirement constitutes a moving violation.

titles.title: Relating to State actions to protect children from injury in motor vehicle accidents.
